wikitext.*:
'''-ul''' is a suffix in [[Khuzdul]] meaning "of".<ref>{{webcite|author=The Dwarrow Scholar|articleurl=https://thedwarrowscholar.com/khuzdul/|articlename=Khuzdul Lessons & Downloads|dated=April 25 2012|website=[https://thedwarrowscholar.com/ thedwarrowscholar.com]|accessed=}} (Discussed in responses.)</ref>
<ref>[https://pages.stern.nyu.edu/~adamodar/ryan/Linguistics/Dictionaries/Dwarvish%20Dictionary.htm Dwarvish Dictionary]</ref>

It is a part of the word [[Khuzdul]], ''(Language) '''of''' the [[Dwarves]]''. It also appears in [[Balin]] [[Fundin]]ul [[uzbad]] [[Khazad-dûm]]u, ''Balin, (son) '''of''' Fundin, Lord of Moria''.

[[Category:Khuzdul words]]
